elements.label: Down The River She Slinks
elements.description: A poetic rebuttal to Clemens Brentano's Lorelei

elements.label: De Bellis Murorum
elements.description: An eighteenth-century epic poem by the pseudonymous 'Solipsistos', in its original Latin. Perhaps Morland will find this interesting.

elements.label: Poster for "Devotion of the Voiceless Havfrue"
elements.description: A debut operetta inspired by a statue in the hometown of its composer.

elements.label: The Orchid Transfigurations, Vol 2
elements.description: A sixteenth-century alchemical fever-dream, attributed to Robert Fludd, frequently banned for the disturbing allure of its illustrations. This is in the original Latin.

elements.label: L'Ancien Conte de Ker Ys.
elements.description: While the french romanticists may have "recovered" the story, it was never forgotten on the coasts and islands of the english channel. This book contains a collection of those stories, written in a mix of academic and rural french. I should enlist a francophone to help me unravel the words.
